item.description:
Come join us this Saturday night at one of Boston's newest venues, The Estate! This huge, two floor lounge/club has great DJs and atmosphere. A fun place to meet new people and to get your groove on! All members welcome, and feel free to bring a friend or two!

DETAILS: We will meet at 9pm in the bar area at Troquet (140 Boylston, it is a French restaurant) We will head over to The Estate around 9:45pm to beat the lines. The line starts to build by 10pm, so please meet us before 10pm, as you may not find us later. Expected cover: $20 (maybe less depending on turnout.)

FIND THE ORGANIZER: My picture is located on the left-hand side of the site. For help/questions, my cell: 646.541.0708.

The Estate is an upscale venue, so please dress appropriately. If traveling by T, The Estate located near Boylston T stop on the green line.

The Estate (formerly called Mansion) is one of my favorite venues. Hope to see you there! Charlie

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Fall Launch Event! @ The Estate, This Saturday, Sept 22!
